trans-unit.source: Finding unsanctioned cloud applications with Cloud App Discovery | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Finding unsanctioned cloud applications with Cloud App Discovery | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Provides information about finding and managing applications with Cloud App Discovery, what are the benefits and how it works.
trans-unit.target: Provides information about finding and managing applications with Cloud App Discovery, what are the benefits and how it works.

trans-unit.source: Finding unsanctioned cloud applications with Cloud App Discovery
trans-unit.target: Finding unsanctioned cloud applications with Cloud App Discovery

trans-unit.source: Overview
trans-unit.target: Overview

trans-unit.source: In modern enterprises, IT departments are often not aware of all the cloud applications that members of their organization use to do their work.
trans-unit.target: In modern enterprises, IT departments are often not aware of all the cloud applications that members of their organization use to do their work.

trans-unit.source: It is easy to see why administrators would have concerns about unauthorized access to corporate data, possible data leakage and other security risks.
trans-unit.target: It is easy to see why administrators would have concerns about unauthorized access to corporate data, possible data leakage and other security risks.

trans-unit.source: This lack of awareness can make creating a plan for dealing with these security risks seem daunting.
trans-unit.target: This lack of awareness can make creating a plan for dealing with these security risks seem daunting.

trans-unit.source: Cloud App Discovery is a feature of Azure Active Directory (AD) Premium that enables you to discover cloud applications being used by the people in your organization.
trans-unit.target: Cloud App Discovery is a feature of Azure Active Directory (AD) Premium that enables you to discover cloud applications being used by the people in your organization.

trans-unit.source: With Cloud App Discovery, you can:
trans-unit.target: With Cloud App Discovery, you can:

trans-unit.source: Find the cloud applications being used and measure that usage by number of users, volume of traffic or number of web requests to the application.
trans-unit.target: Find the cloud applications being used and measure that usage by number of users, volume of traffic or number of web requests to the application.

trans-unit.source: Identify the users that are using an application.
trans-unit.target: Identify the users that are using an application.

trans-unit.source: Export data for offline analysis.
trans-unit.target: Export data for offline analysis.

trans-unit.source: Bring these applications under IT control and enable single sign on for user management.
trans-unit.target: Bring these applications under IT control and enable single sign on for user management.

trans-unit.source: How it works
trans-unit.target: How it works

trans-unit.source: Application usage agents are installed on user's computers.
trans-unit.target: Application usage agents are installed on user's computers.

trans-unit.source: The application usage information captured by the agents is sent over a secure, encrypted channel to the cloud app discovery service.
trans-unit.target: The application usage information captured by the agents is sent over a secure, encrypted channel to the cloud app discovery service.

trans-unit.source: The Cloud App Discovery service evaluates the data and generates reports.
trans-unit.target: The Cloud App Discovery service evaluates the data and generates reports.

trans-unit.target: Cloud App Discovery diagram

trans-unit.source: To get started with Cloud App Discovery, see [Getting Started With Cloud App Discovery](http://social.technet.microsoft.com/wiki/contents/articles/30962.getting-started-with-cloud-app-discovery.aspx)
trans-unit.target: To get started with Cloud App Discovery, see [Getting Started With Cloud App Discovery](http://social.technet.microsoft.com/wiki/contents/articles/30962.getting-started-with-cloud-app-discovery.aspx)
